function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of HVAC systems during infectious disease outbreaks","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading infectious viruses through air circulation","Mitigation":"Limiting the use of HVAC systems and implementing alternative measures for air circulation","Technologies":"Air extractors, air purification systems, high-efficiency filters","People":"Residents, building occupants, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Building management, maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Inadequate air flow control in HVAC systems","Impact":"Resuspension of SARS-CoV-2 droplets and increased airborne transmission","Mitigation":"Professional evaluation of HVAC systems, control of air flow rates, integration of filtration systems","Technologies":"Smart systems for air quality detection and adjustment","People":"Residents, building occupants, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Building management, maintenance personnel"}]}
